::Amperion::
    He sees his shots pass straight through the bots and was quite startled.  
He turned around as he heard the cave collapse.  "I should have known the 
cowards would try something like that."  He looks around spotting another 
exit about ten feet up.  "That must be left from where they collapse the 
entrance.  It's so small though.  Wait I'm part cat, I can get through 
there."  He backs up a few steps and makes a running leap returning to beast 
mode in midair.  He catches the edge of the hole with his forepaws and pulls 
himself through.  He leaps down in time to see them flying off still 
laughing.  "The cowards will pay!"  He starts to transform but decides 
against it as he can move faster and quieter in this mode.  He follows them 
keeping out of sight to wherever they are going.
